title: Remedy Cafe - Downtown
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A licensed chai bar Indian restaurant offering vegan choices in food and baked goods including chana masala, sabji masala, daal, vegan chicken chana wrap, all with either pita or rice. House made chai is vegan-based with almond milk and soy milk options. This location is frequented by students.
